ProjectTitle: The role of bacterial persistence in the evolvability of antibiotic resistance
InitialFeedbackHistory:
09/06/2023
Documentation: you list metadata standards under the first sub-question point 6, so you can say "yes, see previous question" under the second part 
Storage: what do you mean by "KU Leuven data Cloud"? Onedrive? Its better not to store data on lab PCs only, but you can sync to onedrive, for more information see: https://icts.kuleuven.be/storagewijzer/en
